Name: Ajwhiteway
AboutMe:
I'm a computational/theoretical physicist by training working as a Software Developer.

I've used a variety of languages and am able to adapt to new language requirements. I've worked with Linux, Mac, and Windows developement and with Cluster Computing, MPI (~200 CPUs), Cuda, Cuda-MPI hybrid (4 CPUs, 4 GPUs). A wide range of modelling and simulation techniques in school.

Professionally (starting in 2015) I've worked with ASP.NET, IIS, MSSQL, Analysis Services, ExtJS, Swift (iOS), and more.

I enjoy challenging problems and like to help out when I can.
